summary: This document is an email from the FBI Victim Services Division to a law firm, inviting victims of Jeffrey Epstein to attend briefings on October 15, 2019 in Miramar, FL and October 23, 2019 in New York, NY. It includes security requirements for attendees and confirms the firm represents identified victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator whose victims are being invited to FBI briefings.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: FBI Victim Services Division briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein held at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division organized briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
Briefings were scheduled for October 15, 2019 in Miramar, FL and October 23, 2019 in New York, NY.
Law firms representing identified victims were contacted to facilitate victim attendance.
Security protocols required detailed personal information for attendees due to the federal building locations.
The document indicates ongoing FBI outreach and support for Epstein's victims following his arrest and death.
